message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product for you that I think you'd be very interested in.  I'm asking for $10,000 for it.  Let me know your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your interest!  I understand your offer, but I'm still a bit higher than $9,000.  How about we split the difference and go with $9,500?  That seems fair given the value of the product.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $9,000. How about we meet at $9,200? I'm willing to compromise, but I really want to stay within my budget.
